trans-unit.source: Draws a series of connected lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: Disegna una serie di linee e curve collegate.

trans-unit.source: The Path object can draw closed or open shapes, multiple shapes, and even curved shapes.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto Path è possibile disegnare forme chiuse o aperte, più forme e anche forme curve.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Line> and <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline> objects, you can use this object to draw curves.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Line>e <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline>oggetti, è possibile utilizzare questo oggetto per tracciare le curve.</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Line>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path.Data%2A> property for a description of the shapes that the Path element supports.
trans-unit.target: Vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path.Data%2A>proprietà per una descrizione delle forme che supporta l'elemento del percorso.</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path.Data%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Path"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Path"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that specifies the shape to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> che specifica la forma da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: To draw simple shapes, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: Per disegnare forme semplici, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>

trans-unit.source: To draw curves, arcs, or complex shapes, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> object.
trans-unit.target: Per disegnare curve, archi o forme complesse, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: To create a composite geometry, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Per creare una geometria composita, utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: To combine geometries, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>.
trans-unit.target: Per combinare le geometrie, utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` singleGeometry ``` ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *singleGeometry* A single object element that derives from .
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo degli elementi XAML ``` singleGeometry ``` # # attributo XAML ``` ``` # # valori XAML *singleGeometry* un singolo elemento oggetto che deriva da .

trans-unit.source: This can be one of the following: - One of the simple geometries <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry>.
trans-unit.target: Può trattarsi di uno dei seguenti:-una delle geometrie semplici <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>

trans-unit.source: - A single <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, which supports other geometries as child elements.
trans-unit.target: -Un singolo <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, che supporta altre geometrie come elementi figlio.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: See XAML Values section for <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la sezione valori XAML per <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>, which supports child object elements that establish a path geometry object model of figures and segments.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>, che supporta gli elementi oggetto figlio che definiscono un modello a oggetti geometry percorso di figure e segmenti.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: See XAML Values section for <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la sezione valori XAML per <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: *moveAndDrawCommands* One or more move and draw commands.
trans-unit.target: *moveAndDrawCommands* uno o più, spostare e comandi di disegno.

trans-unit.source: For the complete syntax, see [Path Markup Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per la sintassi completa, vedere [sintassi del percorso di Markup](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| | ,

trans-unit.source: A description of the shape to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Descrizione della forma da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path.Data*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path.Data*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path.Data*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
